name: BoundBear
description:
Bouncing Bear - the new sensational bouncing game!

Bear is learning to bounce.
Reunite him with Father to become the ultimate Bouncing Bear!

[ How to Play ]
Tap, pull, aim... and release!
Fly Bear across countless stages avoiding all sorts of obstacles to bounce to Father!

Bounce Bears anywhere, anytime!
Bouncing Bear can be enjoyed by everyone!
- Adorn these cute little spherical beasts bounce around on your smartphone
- Challenge all the Missions assigned by Father
- Try shooting from all different angles
- Make new records in Challenge Mode


* All features of this game are in English.
* This game is available for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad.
(Recommended iPhone 4S/iPod touch 5th or later)
